price: Tena humo hatakufa wala hawi hai.
arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ
footnotes: Tena hatokufa huko Motoni akapumzika kwa kifo, wala hawi hai kwa uhai wa kustarehe nao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā
